flow.name: for
flow.variables: {(colon)variable, Variable name(colon)} {(colon)startvalue, START or variable name(colon)} {(colon)finishvalue, END or variable name(colon)} {(colon)stepvalue, STEP or variable name(colon)}

flow.name: optionDuo
flow.variables: {(colon)message, MESSAGE to prompt user with(colon)} {(colon)option1, OPTION #1 Prompt(colon)} {(colon)option2, OPTION #2 Prompt(colon)}

abstract.name: execute
abstract.variables: {(colon)retryEnabled, Should this atom retry on failure? (Overrides settings.xml)(colon)} {(colon)retryAttempts, Retry how many times? (Overrides settings.xml)(colon)} {(colon)stopIfFailure, Should this atom stop on a failure? (Overrides settings.xml)(colon)} {(colon)atomOnFailure, Run these atoms on failure(colon)} {(colon)atomBeforeRuns, Run these atoms before Trial or Official Runs(colon)} {(colon)atomAfterRuns, Run these atoms after Trial or Official Runs(colon)} {(colon)atomOnSpinup, Run these spinup atoms after the machine reboots(colon)} {(colon)atomCheckConflicts, Run these atoms to find and enumerate conflicts(colon)} {(colon)runOnlyOnOfficialRun, Run this atom only on an Official Run?(colon)}

abstract.name: executeParams
abstract.real: {(colon)executable, Full executable path(colon)} {(colon)p1, First parameter(colon)} {(colon)p2, Second parameter(colon)} {(colon)p3, Third parameter(colon)} {(colon)p4, Fourth parameter(colon)} {(colon)p5, Fifth parameter(colon)} {(colon)p6, Sixth parameter(colon)} {(colon)p7, Seventh parameter(colon)} {(colon)p8, Eighth parameter(colon)} {(colon)p9, Ninth parameter(colon)} {(colon)p10, Tenth parameter(colon)}
abstract.variables: {(colon)retryEnabled, Should this atom retry on failure? (Overrides settings.xml)(colon)} {(colon)retryAttempts, Retry how many times? (Overrides settings.xml)(colon)} {(colon)stopIfFailure, Should this atom stop on a failure? (Overrides settings.xml)(colon)} {(colon)atomOnFailure, Run these atoms on failure(colon)} {(colon)atomBeforeRuns, Run these atoms before Trial or Official Runs(colon)} {(colon)atomAfterRuns, Run these atoms after Trial or Official Runs(colon)} {(colon)atomOnSpinup, Run these spinup atoms after the machine reboots(colon)} {(colon)atomCheckConflicts, Run these atoms to find and enumerate conflicts(colon)} {(colon)runOnlyOnOfficialRun, Run this atom only on an Official Run?(colon)}
